title: Gift alert: This refurbished MacBook Air is under $300
content:
Macworld

Don’t look now, but the holiday season is approaching. Not sure what to get the Apple fan on your list? We’d wager that they’d love to get this refurbished MacBook Air. And since it’s under $300 until October 31st, you can cross them off your list without breaking the bank.

This MacBook Air, though admittedly a few years old, still has a lot of service life left in it. It has been professionally cleaned and inspected to ensure that it runs as it did when it was brand new. The only thing about it is that it may come with scuffing or scratches on its exterior, but these won’t affect functionality.

And it’s for this reason that you can pick it up affordably. It features a 13” display, a 1.6GHz Intel Core i5 processor for quick and powerful operations, 8GB of RAM, and 128GB SSD for storing files locally. Best of all, it has a 12-hour battery, which makes it a great option for students who need something that’s both portable and long-lasting.

Get ahead of gift shopping for the Apple lover in your life.

Grab them this refurbished 13″ MacBook Air for just $299.97. No coupon is required, but this deal ends October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific!
